com.foodbook.foodbook
Class RecipeBookActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.foodbook.foodbook.TitleBarOverride
          com.foodbook.foodbook.RecipeBookActivity

public class RecipeBookActivity
extends TitleBarOverride

This class is an activity class for local recipes.

There are three tabs that users can select. "All", "Mine", and "Downloads" Upon clicking of each tab, the corresponding list of recipes will be displayed.

Author:
Jaeseo Park (jaeseo1), Jasmine Woo (jwoo), Nhu Bui (nbui), Robert Janes (rjanes)
